radio_item.label: On
radio_item.tool_tip: This option shows name tags at all times.

radio_item.label: Off
radio_item.tool_tip: This option hides name tags at all times.

radio_item.label: Show briefly
radio_item.tool_tip: This option shows name tags for a short customizable amount of time when the avatar appears for the first time before fading away. This option depends on both 'Name Fade Duration' and 'Start Fading After' below.

slider.label: Name fade duration (s):
slider.tool_tip: This option controls the amount of time in s (seconds) it takes for name tags to fade out when they started doing so. This option only works with 'Show Briefly' as name tag visibility option selected.
slider.name: name_fade_slider

slider.label: Start fading after (s):
slider.tool_tip: This option controls the amount of time in s (seconds) which have to pass before name tags start fading out after appearing for the first time. This option only works with 'Show Briefly' as name tag visibility option selected.
slider.name: name_start_fade_slider

check_box.label: Allow Display Names
check_box.tool_tip: This option allows the usage of display names in most of the UI. Display names are user chosen, weekly changable names which can differ from the username used to log in.
check_box.name: display_names_check

check_box.label: Show Display Names
check_box.tool_tip: This option allows the usage of display names in name tags. Display names are user chosen, weekly changable names which can differ from the username used to log in.
check_box.name: show_display_names_checkbox1

check_box.label: Show Usernames
check_box.tool_tip: This option shows the original user name used to log in to Second Life alongside the chosen display name should they be enabled.
check_box.name: show_usernames_checkbox1

check_box.label: Show Group Titles
check_box.tool_tip: This option shows group titles in name tags if a user has an active group currently, otherwise it wont show.
check_box.name: show_all_title_checkbox1

check_box.label: Highlight Friend Names
check_box.tool_tip: This option allows name tags of friends to visually differ in color to highlight that the user in question is currently on your friendlist.
check_box.name: show_friends_checkbox1

check_box.label: Show my own Name
check_box.tool_tip: This option shows your own name tag. It works independently from other name tags but is subject to 'Name Fade Duration' and 'Start Fading After' still.
check_box.name: show_my_name_checkbox1

check_box.label: Automatically Login
check_box.tool_tip: This option controls whether the Viewer should attempt to log you in automatically whenever you start it. ||<red>This option does not work with RLVa enabled.</red>
check_box.name: Auto_login

check_box.label: Remember flying state at Logout
check_box.tool_tip: This option controls whether the Viewer should remember your flying state when you log out. You will be flying when you log in the next time rather than falling to the ground.
check_box.name: Flying_At_Exit

line_editor.tool_tip: This option sets the automatic text answer that should be send to anyone sending you a message while you are in 'Busy' mode.
line_editor.name: do_not_disturb_response
